descriptionHtml:
Here the enb preset mandrake to bring life and color into your skyrim!

instalation:
download my file and open it with winrar select the file and copy them into the directory of your games or the skyrim there is the data folder!
Secondly please download ENBSeries 254 borris vorontsov this address: http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html
then copy the dll in your repertoire of game

mods requier:

climate of tamriel
realistic lighting overhaul

recomended mods:

weather lighting patch
supreme storm
lighting during thunder
expended snow system
lantern of skyrim
hd 2k textures
wet and cold
Realistic Water Two
Watercolor for ENB and Realistic Water Two
author: neocrow
